title.narrative: Firming cooperative business diversification and member professionalization

description.narrative: ABM «Iterambere ry’Abahinzi-Borozi ba Makera » is a maize and cooperative and started its activities in 2007. IABM has 799 members of whom 64.7% females and 35.3% males. Besides the current members IABM has 976 potential members (supplying maize and seeds to IABM). It is primarily engaged in seed Multiplication and maize processing into flour.Among other activities include the supply of production inputs (seeds fertilizers and pesticides) members training / capacity building commercialization of maize flour distribution animal feed from the maize factory and support members to access bank loans.Apart from the maize value chain IABM members are active horticulture value chain by producing different horticultural crops including but not limited to onions tomatoes sweet peppers peas cabbages. In 2020 Action Plan Agriterra and IABM have agreed to extend the maize hybrid seed multiplication project by trying production of prebasic seeds strengthening capacity of staff and members on maize seed processing mobilise more members into the cooperative introduce data management tool for member relationship management(CRM) conduct an external financial audit and develop a procurement manual. Besides this support Agriterra will extend its advisory work into irrigation scheme operationalisation and management and taking record keeping at both farmer and cooperatives revel. Agriterra will also train IABM and its members on Marketing Organic fertilizer making and composting. To foster financial solidity of IABM Agriterra will give them a strategic financial management.
The overall goal of this project to strengthen the cooperative's business diversification and enhance member professionalization towards increased farmer revenue.

The project is in line with IABM's strategic plan where the cooperative aims to strengthen its business diversification and professionalization of its members. This project is composed of three main sections: 

Section one composed of activities to be implemented by the cooperative with advise of the Agriterra Buiness Advisor. These activities include: 1. Expanding training on hybrid seeds production and introduction of prebasic seeds 2.Technical support for cooperative staff and farmers on sorting grading and packaging maize seeds 3.Participate in agricultural exhibition Mobilize and train new members with special focus on youth 4.Purchase and introduce data management tool for member relationship management(CRM) 5.Conducting external audit for 2019 and 6. Develop a sound procurement manual.

Section two composed of key advisory services of the business advisor towards the cooperative in line with its main goal. These include but not limited to : 1) Support institutionalisation of record keeping at farmer and cooperative level and 2) Advice on irrigation scheme management

Section three composed of key trainings that Agriterra will provide to IABM cooperative. These include: 1) Basic Marketing Training 2)Training on organic farming and composting workshop Strategic 3) Financial Management Training
